Rulings.Edison:
● You can't activate this effect unless there is a level 4 or lower Zombie in either GY. 
When this effect resolves, you can target the discarded card if it is a level 4 or lower Zombie.
● If that target isn't a Zombie when this effect resolves, it isn't summoned.
Rulings.Tengu:
● You can't activate this effect unless there is a level 4 or lower Zombie in either GY. 
When this effect resolves, you can target the discarded card if it is a level 4 or lower Zombie.
● If that target isn't a Zombie when this effect resolves, it isn't summoned.

Rulings.Cat:
● This card’s effect targets 1 LV 4 or lower Zombie-Type Monster when activated.
● If you activate “Zombie Master’s” effect, and an effect is chained that removes “Zombie Master” from the field or flips it face-down, the effect disappears and you can't Special Summon the targeted monster.
● You can Special Summon the monster sent to the GY as a cost to activate this effect.
● You can't activate 'Zombie Master's' effect if there are no LV 4 or lower Zombies in the GY, even if you would discard one to activate the effect.

Rulings.ReturnDAD:
● This card’s effect targets 1 LV 4 or lower Zombie-Type Monster when activated.
● If you activate “Zombie Master’s” effect, and an effect is chained that removes “Zombie Master” from the field or flips it face-down, the effect disappears and you can't Special Summon the targeted monster.
● You can discard and summon the same Zombie, even if there are no other cards in your GY.

Rulings.Stein: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Base:
1. This card's effect targets 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie-Type Monster when activated.
2. If you activate the effect of "Zombie Master", and an effect is chained that removes "Zombie Master" from the field or flips it face-down, the effect disappears and you cannot Special Summon the targeted monster.
3. You can Special Summon the monster sent to the GY as a cost to activate this effect.
4. You cannot activate the effect of "Zombie Master" if there are no Level 4 or lower Zombie-Type monsters in the GY, even if you would discard one to activate the effect.

PSCT.Edison:
① Once per turn: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY, then target 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie in any GY; Special Summon that target. 
(activate and resolve only if this card is face-up on the field).
